thread.section_title: Club Quarters Hotel, Trafalgar Square - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Perfect Location, Great Hotel!
thread.title_full: Perfect Location, Great Hotel! - Review of Club Quarters Hotel, Trafalgar Square, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Julesinfl
title: Perfect Location, Great Hotel!
text: We arrived in London at the Club Quarters very early in the morning after a long flight, in need of luggage storage and a little refreshing. The front desk folks were more than accommodating and we went galavanting around London all day - checked in late to a quaint, perfectly appointed, tidy room. It was perfect for us, an absolutely ideal location - central to everywhere downtown and easily accessible from the tube. The staff were super helpful and friendly. Would stay here agin for sure. Thank you!
